name: Space Escape (Stathampen)
description:
You've just stolen something very important. What did you steal? It's not important.

What is important is that you escape! You only way out is through the Orbital Ship yard.

One problem...You don't have any guns. But you do have a grappling hook.

Created for the Games Jobs Live Summer Jame
Theme: One Time Use.

Controls:

WASD for movement
Left Shift to speed up
Space to slow down

NameRole
Alexander Statham
Programmer, UX, Modelling

Joe O'Rourke
Composer, Audio Designer

Third Party Assets Used.
Orbit background from this pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-fr...
